import './style.scss'; import React from 'react' import { ProdImage } from 'pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Image' import ProdLink from 'pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Link' import { f_class } from "helpers/formatter" import { Price, OldPrice } from "components/Prices" import Schema from "pages/Prods/Prod/parts/Schema" const Card = (props) => { const { prod, className, hideClaim, hidePrice } = props return (
{prod.name}

{prod.claim}

) } export default Card
